name: Snaildodge
description:
Snaildodge is a fairly simple arcade game. The objective is to collect as many points as possible without allowing the little snail to be crushed by a rock.

The game is made with retro pixel art video game look with 8 bit music to reaffirm the artistic touch.

You can move from left to right arrows.

The stars will give you 100 points.
If you get crushed by a rock, the game is over.
